text:
Two women constables, both posted at Dharapuram, sustained injuries in a road accident that took place on late Friday night.

The motorcycle driven by S.Akila (26), working at All Woman Police Station in Dharapuram, with R. Usha (21), posted at Dhapuram police station, on pillion reportedly collided with another motorbike at Dharapuram.

The constables were admitted to taluk-government hospital.
title: Women constables injured
